item.title: Archetype Test
item.description: Test print("Hello, World!") function updateClock() { var now = new Date(); hours = now.getHours(); minutes = now.getMinutes(); if (minutes < 10) { time = hours + ':' + "0" + minutes; } else { time = hours + ':' + minutes; } if (hours < 10) { time = "0" + time; } document.getElementById('time').innerHTML = time; setTimeout(updateClock, 1000); } updateClock();
